Package org.freeplane.api

Interface MindMapRO

All Known Subinterfaces:
Map, MapRO, MindMap, Proxy.Map, Proxy.MapRO, Proxy.MindMap, Proxy.MindMapRO
public interface MindMapRO
The map a node belongs to: node.map - read-only.
Since:
1.7.10
